editorParams.PARSESCRIPT: value?.replace(/@{[^,]*,"name":"(.*?)"}/g,"@$1").replace(/@{[^,]*,name=(.*?)}/g,"@$1").replace(/#{"id":"(.+?)","name":"(.+?)","identifier":"(.+?)","icon":"((.|[\t\r\f\n\s])+?)"}/g, "$4 $3 $2").replace(/#{id=(.+?),name=(.+?),identifier=(.+?),icon=((.|[\t\r\f\n\s])+?)}/g, "$4 $3 $2").replaceAll(/\{\"\emoji\":\"(.+?)\"\}/g,(x, emoji) => {const tempVal = decodeURIComponent(atob(emoji)); return `${tempVal}`})
